name: df-quot
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cquot, cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cply, cc), cdif(cfv(cply, cc), csn(c0p)), crio(s2, cfv(cply, cc), wsbc(s3, co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), co(cv(s1), cof(cmul), cv(s2))), wo(wceq(cv(s3), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(s3)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(s1))))))))
comment: Define the quotient function on polynomials. This is the ` q ` of the expression ` f = g x. q + r ` in the division algorithm. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jul-2014.)
